title: PRD Redesign: About Us Page (DoktorABC)
context: The 'About Us' page is the main brand credibility touchpoint for new and returning customers. It must communicate who we are, our mission and vision, and the trustworthiness of DoktorABC's medical and operational infrastructure.

new_visitors.description: Arrive from Google or marketing campaigns
new_visitors.goal: Build trust, understand the company's mission, and feel safe to purchase or start consultation

returning_customers.goal: Learn more about regulatory framework, physicians, and global presence

press_partners.goal: Quickly identify company scope, certifications, and media mentions

design_sections.requirements: Standard DoktorABC header with: Company logo, Cart, My Account, Hamburger menu
design_sections.notes: Same as across main site. Sticky at top.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Who We Are', Text: 'DoktorABC is a trusted European telemedicine platform...', Visual: Image of doctor with patient or pharmacy team
design_sections.notes: First fold must establish brand identity, professionalism, and tone of trust.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Our Mission', Text: Mission statement, Graphic: Process line or icons showing flow – Consult → Diagnosis → Prescription → Dispensing
design_sections.notes: Design should mirror the slide visual with a clean, medical layout.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Our Vision', Text: 'To redefine the way people access healthcare...'
design_sections.notes: Place after Mission for logical flow. Minimal visual needed.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Where We Operate', Text: Operating regions description, Map Visualization: Interactive or static map with flag regions
design_sections.notes: Use green brand markers on map.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'How We Grow', 4 Data Blocks: 1M+ Customers Served, 40+ Types of Treatments, 50+ Partner Pharmacies, 100+ Employees, 7 years of trust, Include Trustpilot rating (4.6★ from 13,000+ reviews) and Käuferschutz badge
design_sections.notes: Should visually match presentation 'How we grow' slide.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Meet Our Doctors', Doctor Card Template: photo, name/title, country, bio, regulatory authority, registration link
design_sections.notes: Display 3-4 doctor cards per row, scrollable on mobile.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'What Our Patients Say', Content: Carousel of 4-6 verified Trustpilot reviews with rating stars and review snippet, Include average rating
Title: 'As Seen In' or 'Our Press', Logos carousel of media outlets (Yahoo Finance, Tagesspiegel, Nordbayern.de, OK! Magazin, Vital)
design_sections.notes: Same press logo order and styling as homepage.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Our Certifications', Include logos and short descriptions: LegitScript, PCI Security Standards Council, DMCA Protected, BIM Membership
design_sections.notes: Display horizontally in logo row with small text below each.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Your Privacy & Payment Security', Icons for accepted payment methods, Include DoktorABC Data Privacy logo (GDPR compliance)
design_sections.notes: Compact visual design – trust-focused close to footer.

design_sections.requirements: Title: 'Start Your Treatment Today', Button: 'View All Treatments' or 'Start Consultation'
design_sections.notes: Optional closing CTA to lead back to main conversion funnel.

design_sections.requirements: Standard DoktorABC footer with: Logo, Navigation links, Payment methods, Country flags, Company address & certifications, © 2025, Disclaimer text
design_sections.notes: Must match global site structure and styling.
